response.overview: Denis Law, a humble Aberdeen native, overcame a hereditary sight problem to become a football legend. As part of Manchester United's iconic trinity with Bobby Charlton and George Best, Law's extraordinary goal-scoring prowess earned him a place in football history. This authorised biography, featuring insights from Sir Alex Ferguson and others, highlights Law's journey from barefoot beginnings to Britain's most expensive player. His lasting impact is commemorated in the famous Trinity statue outside Old Trafford, symbolising his status as a football great.
response.title: Denis Law - The King
